channel.title: Desolution/Epicurus Remake 317 Has grand exchange. Perfect skilling
channel.description:
[b][size=14pt]Desolution is a great rsps that has had over 300 Accounts registered in a day! The features include flawless pking skilling and pvming Active staff / Owners And much more! Check it out today Credits 98% Epicurus Staff 2% Kidgoku
Updates Fixed the Npc's None of them had animations nor die animations. Going to be making more playable content sooner in time :)
www.Desolution.org[/size][/b]
[URL=http://minus.com/lbxXRvEwSL2pgf][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbxXRvEwSL2pgf.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lvAFBrZcdeu16][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jvAFBrZcdeu16.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lbh4u3kLJ3Tckn][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbh4u3kLJ3Tckn.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lb24BNg90XJCrv][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jb24BNg90XJCrv.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lep3HGo9aQRzU][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jep3HGo9aQRzU.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/luIKgVYy6hu2D][IMG]http://i.minus.com/juIKgVYy6hu2D.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lbjmjo84mo9IeO][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbjmjo84mo9IeO.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://minus.com/lzQMloqwc4PKO][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jzQMloqwc4PKO.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Desolution/Epicurus Remake 317 Has grand exchange. Perfect skilling
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:
@kidgoku4522 wrote:

Togasa:

Not hating, but this is about the tenth epicurus-based server I’ve seen today with the same exact home, NPC placements, thieving stalls and other objects, etc…some haven’t even changed all the names from 'Epicurus" to their server’s name lol.

I only develope for the server I don’t run it :_)
